g.id: Removal set status is synced when the largest set of removal certificates receives a quorum number of votes
g.text: Removal set status is synced when the largest set of removal certificates receives a quorum number of votes
Sends a removal signature which contains the shard, peer, and a signature
Send certificate if it does not already exist in local set
Broadcast the new highest removal set + signature

g.id: encoder.A timeout is triggered to remove a peer
g.text: A timeout is triggered to remove a peer

g.id: shard.Shard members independently timeout and decide to remove a peer
g.text: Shard members independently timeout and decide to remove a peer

g.id: encoder.Once a quorum of signatures are aggregated, they are turned into a certificate
g.text: Once a quorum of signatures are aggregated, they are turned into a certificate

g.id: encoder.Checks if the certificate already exists in the encoders local removal set
g.text: Checks if the certificate already exists in the encoders local removal set

g.id: shard.If the certifcate is unknown, integrate it into their own local removal set
g.text: If the certifcate is unknown, integrate it into their own local removal set
